entry.title: Banik Ostrava 2-4 Celtic : Goals & Reaction
entry.summary:
Photo by Craig Williamson/SNS Group via Getty Images
Celtic ran out 4-2 winners in Czech Republic after a hard fought contest with FC Banik Ostrava, who celebrated their centenary year in the process. Here’s the goals in what is a fairly high quality package you rarely see on Youtube:
Kyogo, O’Riley, Giakoumakis and Abada all got on the scoresheet for the hoops. A live reaction on 67HailHail followed the game with the lads, which can you also enjoy below:
The latest on Jackanory Corner is this french guy Edouard Michut who is apparently close to signing: https://www.glasgowtimes.co.uk/sport/20275614.celtic-target-edouard-michut-transfer-ange-postecoglous-side-set-offer-2m-bid/ We’ll hold off with any exclusives and ‘what you should know’ about him before there’s something more substantial than Fabrizio Romano’s tweets.
